name: Godstone: Prologue
description:
Join Max, Zed, Rae, and their friends in GODSTONE, a western horror adventure RPG! Run, jump, aim, and explore as you help them hunt for a dangerous treasure that won't let itself stay buried.

This demo contains the prologue to the game and represents a work in progress. The Web Version has issues with sound timing due to the way HTML games load resources. The Web Version is provided with easy and immediate accessibility in mind. The optimal way to experience Godstone is downloading the Desktop Version below, but please choose whichever version you find best suited for you.

We hope you enjoy meeting Max and Zed and overcoming the messes they get themselves into in this introductory chapter to GODSTONE!
